assignment_name: We’re testing… YOUR SKILLS! 😆🔥 - Recursive Power Function (Fast Exponentiation)

test_cases.concept: Divide and Conquer, Recursion, Time Complexity Optimization

description:
Given two integers x and n, compute 
𝑥
𝑛
x
n
 using recursion.

You must implement the solution using Divide and Conquer (Fast Exponentiation) approach.

Requirements:

Do not use built-in power functions.

Time complexity must be O(log n).

Handle negative powers as well.

Constraints:

-10⁴ ≤ x ≤ 10⁴

-10⁹ ≤ n ≤ 10⁹

Output should be returned as a floating-point number if needed.
